Name: Purchase Order Number
Notes: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken
Remarks: P0304: If either SPO-03 or SPO-04 is present, then the other is required

Name: Quantity
Remarks: SPO04 is the total quantity for the purchase order.

Name: Weight Unit Code
Remarks: P0506: If either SPO-05 or SPO-06 is present, then the other is required

Name: Weight
Remarks: SPO06 is the total weight for the purchase order.

Name: Application Error Condition Code
Remarks: SPO07 indicates the data error condition relative to the shipment management information.

Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks: SPO08 is used to specify sorting and/or segregating reference numbers for each receiving location (processing area).
